interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Beautify Professional Large Lockable Acrylic Vanity Makeup & Cosmetic Storage Display Case with Frame (Rose Gold)
Review Date: 2017/11/13
Store: Beautify
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '11.8 x 6.3 x 7.5 inches; 2.8 Pounds'}
Review Text: I love this case it is so beautiful and I can fit everything but my eyeshadow pallets in it. I should note the bottom portion is large enough. I just prefer to put my brushes and sponges in it. I wish the black compartments were just a bit wider. Despite me loving this so much, I wouldn’t purchase this again. It’s too expensive. The arcrylic is thin, the metal is cheap, handle is plastic, and it’s difficult to get things to aglin. I fear this won’t hold up for more than a year or two.
Review Title: I love it, but poor quality
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Aesthetic Preference:** Values beauty and design in storage solutions, particularly favoring elegant styles like rose gold.
- **Functionality Focus:** Seeks practical organizational products that can accommodate a variety of cosmetics, notably brushes and sponges, though may prioritize ease of use over capacity for larger items like eyeshadow palettes.
- **Quality Concerns:** Shows a tendency to critique the quality of products, indicating a preference for durability and sturdiness. Expresses dissatisfaction with thin materials and cheap components in storage items.
- **Price Sensitivity:** Considers products to be expensive, indicating a budget-conscious approach. Despite enjoying the item, has stated that they would not repurchase due to the perceived high price relative to quality.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Experiences mixed feelings; appreciates beauty but emphasizes functionality and quality, leading to a moderate rating (3.0) for the reviewed product. 

This user profile reflects a balance between style and practicality while highlighting a critical view of product longevity and value for money.
